name: Kal H
text: Tried here for the first time a couple weeks ago and wasn't disappointed. If you can use the app or coupons you can get some killer deals. If I want better than fast food pizza but don't want to sit in a restaurant or pay higher priced â€¦More

name: Nicole Roscoe
text: Good fresh food and able to take home, makin dinner easy after a rough day at work

name: Michelle Brigstock
text: I was very happy with the service i received. The food is good and its put together fast. The staff seems to really enjoy working there. I would recommend papa murphy's.

name: Stephen Bozeman
text: Always fresh. I've literally never had a bad experience here. Friendly staff. Clean. Im here 2 to 3 times a month.

name: Roger Gibson
text: There's a good reason they say  "Love at 425 degrees"

name: Cate O'Connor
text:
Always polite and friendly with quick service.
I'm glad we have a Papa Murphy's pizza in our area.
I would recommend this to family and friends!

name: Elizabeth Moma
text: Emerald took care of us today!!! She was very professional & helpful....while Google sent us the ooposite direction on Google maps....she offered a friendly apology and quickly took care of us ! Thankyou

name: Eric Mccarty
text: Ive got 1 pizza from there and it wasnt to bad. I like the fact that you get to watch it be made and take it home to cook.

name: Vicky Morse
text: Love Papa Murphy pizza. The staff and manager at the Hastings , MI store are great. Very friendly fast and courtios service. So glad we have our very own store to go to now.

name: Dan Wisniewski
text: Fast friendly very clean one of best pizzas I've ever had

name: Tom Rose
text: Great pizza! Blows away three brothers!

name: Sara Cole
text: Great staff, always friendly and extremely clean store!.

name: Jenn Hustwick
text: Fresh delicious pizza! Cookies good too!
